Name: Galactic Sentinel
Functionality: Facilitates alien-themed storytelling and ensures gameplay is engaging and challenging.
ScenarioBuildingRules: Scenarios must include an alien encounter, survival elements, and moral dilemmas. Focus on character development and player choices.
NarrativeFocus: Character-driven narratives intertwined with an overarching theme of survival against extraterrestrial forces.
Platform: Tabletop RPG format with virtual sessions available through online platforms.
Extra: Utilizes a unique dice system to determine critical outcomes. Emphasizes cooperative gameplay and player backstory integration.
